full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG RGYAL PO SKU LNGA BSKANG BSHAGS GTOR 'BUL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO RGYAL PO KUN 'DUS LA GSOL KHA DNGOS GRUB KYI DBANG MDZAD ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG BSGYUR BYED CES BYA BAS RMO PHAG GI LO YI, THA SKAR KHYI'I ZLA BA'I CHOS BZHI, ,CHU PHO KHYE'I NYI MI SPREL GYI DUS LA SKU RTEN PA KUN DGA' DON GRUB KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR RO, ,CHOS SMRA BA'I SH'A BA'I DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA LHUN GRUB DPAL BZANG PO RNAM DPYOD MCHOG GI STEN SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI PHUN TSOGS RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,TSOGS 'KHOR GYI LHAG PA RNAMS PAR ME BSREG DUS 'DON TSUL 'DI YANG DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS BSKUL ME STO RGYAG GSOL 'DI NI CHOS @033B SKYONG TSANGS PO DKAR PO DUNG GI THOR TSUGS CAN GYI SMRA ZHING RJES SU YID DAR NAS, ,PHYAG GNAS GTOR DE CHED DU BRJOD PA, 'DI CHED DU BRJOD DO, ,'BREL MTSUNGS PA NI DBU RGYAN YID DO, ,DGE LUGS PHAL CHER BSANGS BDE 'JIGS GSUM BSKYED PA YIN PAS, ,DE DANG MTHUN PA ZHIG BYAS PA YIN DE CHOS SKYONGS CHANGS BKA' BSTOD LA 'BREL MTSUNGS PA MA BYAS NA MKHAS PA CHE'I DAN KHAG BYUNG GI DGONGS ME YIN PAS DE BZHIN 'BREL MTSUNGS BYAS YIN NO, ,GANG DE YI DAM GSUM GYI GANG GI SGO NAS BSKYED NA CHOS SKYONG GI PHRAG TOG MED PAS, MKHA' BA'I TSOGS DGA' BYAS PA BYED PAR GSOL BA ZHU ZHU, ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
